segments.description: A tall slim aluminum Alani Cherry Twist energy drink can showcased in three setups: the can standing upright on a light-blue scalloped pedestal surface against a hot-pink backdrop; a person holding the can in their left hand outdoors in front of blurred green foliage; and the can standing upright on a clean white surface casting a hard rightward shadow.
segments.visualPrompt: A tall slim aluminum Alani Cherry Twist energy drink can showcased in three setups: the can standing upright on a light-blue scalloped pedestal surface against a hot-pink backdrop; a person holding the can in their left hand outdoors in front of blurred green foliage; and the can standing upright on a clean white surface casting a hard rightward shadow. The camera performs a smooth zoom-in on the can on the pedestal, capturing the vibrant colors and details of the can under bright studio lighting. The background is a striking hot pink, enhancing the energy of the scene.

A close-up shot focuses on the hand holding the can outdoors, with soft natural light filtering through the foliage, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere.

segments.audioNotes: Music: Upbeat electronic music with an adrenaline-pumping tempo.

segments.description: The person takes a refreshing sip from the can, showcasing the product in an energetic outdoor setting.
segments.visualPrompt: The camera captures the person holding the Alani Cherry Twist can, tilting it towards their mouth for a sip. The shot is framed closely on the person's hand and the can, with greenery blurred in the background, enhancing the feeling of adventure. The sunlight glints off the can, highlighting its metallic sheen and vibrant colors as they enjoy the refreshing drink, embodying an active lifestyle.
visualPromptAlternatives: The camera captures the person holding the Alani Cherry Twist can in a close-up, tilting it towards their mouth with a smile on their face. The outdoor setting is bright and colorful, with sunlight filtering through the trees, creating a lively atmosphere that draws attention to the can's design.

A mid-shot shows the person taking a sip from the Alani Cherry Twist can while engaging in an energetic activity, such as riding a bike. The background is filled with greenery and hints of motion, emphasizing the thrill of adventure and the refreshing nature of the drink.

The camera captures a dynamic angle of the person lifting the Alani Cherry Twist can to their lips, with a blurred action shot of them jumping or in motion in the background. The colors are vibrant and the energy is palpable, showcasing the drink's role in fueling their adventurous lifestyle.
segments.audioNotes: Voiceover: 'Boost your energy and unleash your potential with every sip!'

segments.description: The can is showcased on a clean white surface with a strong rightward shadow, inviting viewers to grab one.
segments.visualPrompt: The camera focuses on the Alani Cherry Twist energy drink can standing upright on a clean white surface, casting a sharp rightward shadow. The lighting is bright and crisp, emphasizing the can's attractive design. The shot holds for a moment, allowing viewers to appreciate the details before transitioning to a shot of the can being picked up with an energetic movement, reinforcing the call to action.
visualPromptAlternatives: The can is centered on a bright white surface, with a gradual zoom-in on the can as it casts a hard rightward shadow. The background is minimalistic, focusing all attention on the product, while a soft rim light highlights the curvature of the can, emphasizing its sleek design.

A dynamic angle showcases the can on a white surface, with sunlight creating a dramatic shadow. The camera performs a slow push-in, creating anticipation and excitement around the product, leading into a shot where the can is lifted off the surface.

The camera captures the Alani Cherry Twist can from an overhead angle on a clean white surface. The bright lighting highlights the can's design while the shadow adds depth, creating a visually striking image that invites viewers to take action.
segments.audioNotes: Voiceover: 'Grab yours now and conquer the extreme!'
